author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...EYEWALL OF EXTREMELY DANGEROUS HURRICANE HELENE NOW MOVING  INTO GEORGIA AND ACCELERATING NORTH-NORTHEAST... ...100 AM EDT POSITION UPDATE...
summary:
...EYEWALL OF EXTREMELY DANGEROUS HURRICANE HELENE NOW MOVING  INTO GEORGIA AND ACCELERATING NORTH-NORTHEAST... ...100 AM EDT POSITION UPDATE...
 As of 1:00 AM EDT Fri Sep 27
 the center of Helene was located near 30.8, -83.5
 with movement NNE at 26 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 950 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 110 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Helene (AT4/AL092024)
